author: liyin
msg: [master] Fast fail META and ROOT during rack reboots. Do not wait for 10 mins
Having .META. unavailable during rack failures can block the
client threads trying to fetch information from meta.
In case of a rack reboot. we will not wait for 10 minutes for these
Deploy to dev cluster, and kill the rack with .META. or ROOT.
- verify that the recovery takes off immediately
- verify that we do still wait for 10 mins.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7532] Enable the FavoredNodes for the HFileOutputFormat

Summary: HFileOutputFormat has a writer embedded but it is not configured to use the FavoredNodes. This revision is to add that support to the HFileOutputFormat while it is used as an OutputFormat either the Mapper or the Reducer for a MapReduce task.

author: liyin
msg: [0.89-fb] [master] Fix the order of handling MSG_REPORT_EXITING
Before this fix, we process all the region closes, before marking
the RS as dead. This causes an issue where all the transient region
assignments are placed on the exiting server (if it happens to be the
primary). This would not happen, if the server were in the list
But, because we add the server to the list of dead servers, after
processing the region closes, the server seems "alive and active"
during the assignment process. Fixing the order, so that the
region will be assigned to a different RS, (considering the exiting
test suite. only failure TestHRegionCloseRetry, also fails
Push to TSH025 master and make sure that the regions are not assigned
